name: Factory512
description:
Help the first sentient robot in Factory512 escape and discover the greater world at large!   Start your journey (Q), jump over the obstacles (Z), and throw the switches (X) to navigate your way through the factory, powering on at least two of the seven possible generators before feeling the open air on your metal skin for the first time in robo-history!

Please enjoy this first project completely imagined and realized by our premier artist K! - begun when he was twelve, and completed shortly after his thirteenth birthday.  This was coded entirely in self-taught python 2.7.  He is suspicious of the new-fangled python 3.8 but will consider migrating to it for future work.
